documents.document: The way to know #life is to love many things. ~Vincent Van Gogh
Do not quench your #inspiration and your imagination; do not become the slave of your model. Vincent Van Gogh
“A true #friend sees the good in everything, and brings out the best in the worst of things.” Sasha Azevedo
"The only one who can tell you 'you can't ' is you. And you don't have to listen." - Nike #run
Never give up on something that #you can't go a day without thinking about.~Unknown
Start the New Year right... #Run
If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves. -Thomas Edison (via @tesschallis) #quote #run #achieve
"Don't let fatigue make a coward of you."- Steve Prefontaine #run
"For me, like so many others, #running is the answer. Out on the road it is just you, the pavement, and your will" John Bingham
"Do these shorts make my ass look fast?" ~ #running shorts
I'll race myself, not those around me. #runningresolutions2012 via @brentkinnaird
#runningresolutions2012 to never stop thinking of new routes, new times and new distances via @georgia_simone
Stretch more and drink more water, even when I don't run. #runningresolutions2012 via @amirgrin
Run for a burning passion and not just burning calories #runningresolutions2012 via @lisaluvsthalawd
#runningresolutions2012 find a running partner via @cristhianrabe
To convince more friends to join me on runs. #runningresolutions2012 via @thompkia
Run for charity #runningresolutions2012
#runningresolutions2012 To run a race per month and have my children participate in each fun run! via @runjanisrun
#runningresolutions2012 to run hard with no excuses! via @marcieamaro
Run Smart and avoid injury :) #runningresolutions2012 via @tcclouse
#runningresolutions2012 run for fun. No watch, no pace, no time. Just run via @natbalda
When it hurts, push through the pain & keep going. #runningresolutions2012 via @hannahisaSwan
Run with my heart not my mind #runningresolutions2012 via @moodymatt00
Smile at all runners when we pass #runningresolutions2012
To run at least 6 days a week #runningresolutions2012 via @sayscye
Run barefoot #runningresolutions2012 via @thatgirlruns
Run more without my watch #runningresolutions2012
Play hard, love hard, run hard #runningresolutions2012
"The joy was in the act of #running and in the journey, not in the destination." John Bingham
Start it, run it, push it, sweat it, grunt it, laugh it, finish it #marathon
Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human #spirit - Wilma Rudolph
Few of us know what we are capable of doing…we have never pushed ourselves hard enough to find out– Montapert #run
"I'll lean on you and you lean on me and we'll be okay." - Dave Matthews Band #friends #runningpartners #life
"But if you never try you'll never know...Just what you're worth" Fix You by Coldplay #inspire
I run because it's my passion, and not just a sport. - Sasha Azevedo
I run marathons #yes #for #fun
I live a life of my own design. I go with the flow that's uniquely mine. via @AnnTran_ @SoCalNerium
"They who have #conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure." - James Allen via @GreatestQuotes
"Skill to do comes of doing." Ralph Waldo Emerson via @CharityIdeas #train
To settle is a choice, you can choose to run after your dreams #life #running
Some people say they don't have enough time to train. Others make it happen #noexcuses #run
"Believe that you're young enough, old enough, strong enough & so on to accomplish everything you want to do" John Bingham via #run
Be positive, ignore the critic, follow ur heart, invest in your passions, believe in ur dreams & get busy making them reality~ by @JoshCox
Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls. ~Joseph Campbell #life #run #change
A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself. ~Joseph Campbell #charity #runners
The only disability in life is a bad attitude. -Scott Hamilton (via @rnrgirl) #run #train #marathon #endurance
"A river cuts through rock, not because of its power, but because of its persistence" ~Jim Watkins #run
Do not wait until the conditions are perfect to #begin. Beginning makes the conditions perfect. ~A. Cohen
"Goals determine what you're going to be." ~Julius Erving (via @sirisaac)
Running is freedom. Freedom from races. Freedom from paces. Don't forget to have a free #run
“Naked cheerleaders 1 mile ahead" -mile 25” via @A2Diddy #MarathonCheeringSigns
Is there something you are so passionate about you cannot stop thinking about it? #start #life
A woman or man with outward courage dares to die, A man or woman with inward courage dares to live - Lao Tzu via @TheTrailJogger
Life is for the LIVING. Live Yours ~ via @LoriMoreno #run
We may #run a lot of miles, but it is important to take our friends with us along the way. The road will be a sweeter path.
"Know your limits, then ignore them" ~John Mason #run #marathon via @SoCalNerium
"Some people don't know how to fit their runs in. Other don't know how they can't" #run
If I am still standing at the end of the #race, hit me with a board & knock me down, because that means I didn’t run hard enough~Steve Jones
"It's amazing what you can accomplish when you decide you can't be stopped.” via @Kattemie #run #charity
“Have great hopes and dare to go all out for them. Have great #dreams and dare to live them." Norman Vincent Peale
"Everyone has special talents, and it is our duty to find ours and use them well." - John Templeton via @GreatestQuotes
Why are all these people following me? #Marathon T-Shirt
If you don't love what you do, you won't do it with much conviction or passion. ~Mia Hamm
Chase your #passion ~Denis Waitley
They can because they think they can. ~Virgil #run
I would say Santa qualifies as an endurance athlete #HappyHolidays
I would say Santa qualifies as an endurance athlete #run
“Have great hopes and dare to go all out for them. Have great #dreams and dare to live them." Norman Vincent Peale
"I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move." ~R.L. Stevenson” via @daniel_baylis #run
Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success. ~ Napoleon Hill #run
#Run, live, change, train, focus, help, care, laugh, friends
"Remember, your worst #run is always 100% better than the person who never tries." via @JoshCox
We all have #possibilities we don't know about. We can do things we don't even dream we can do. ~ Dale Carnegie
"If you wait to #do everything until you're sure it's right, you'll probably never do much"-Borden via @Lotay
“Never underestimate the power of #dreams and the influence of the human spirit.” Wilma Rudolph
"Most things which we think are impossible in life, is because we have never tried them. So go for every #dream
"If you’re going to doubt something, doubt your own limits." ~Don Ward via @CharityIdeas #run
Did you know the more conservative you are, in #pace, from the beginning, the more you can push your wall back?” via @JeffGalloway
"Everyone is gifted - but some people never open their package" #live
Take risks, courage to try, dreams that come true, fall in love, discover the #run
"Never #settle for mediocrity when you can have greatness"
"Greatest danger for most of us is not that we aim too #high & we miss it, but we aim too low & reach it." Michelangelo
"Desire is the most important factor in the #success of any athlete." ~Willie Shoemaker
There is no telling how many miles you will have to #run while chasing a dream. ~Author Unknown via @LJ3000
"Everybody's got a laughin' place- trouble is most folks won't take the time to go look for it" #find #laugh #love #friends #run
And a #run--->>>The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love - Hubert H. Humphrey
"You just can't beat the person who won't give up." - Babe Ruth #determination
"A good #friend is a connection 2life - a tie 2the past, a road 2the future, the key 2sanity in a totally insane world" Wyse
The more you #sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle. -Unknown
#Love #live #dream #chances #run
#MarathonCheeringSigns Momma said there'd be days like this. Via @kechk
“Some day you won't be able to do this. Today is NOT that day." #MarathonCheeringSigns via @kevin_gillen
#MarathonCheeringSigns My fave at Chicago 2011, good thing it's not 26.3 miles, because THAT would be insane. #ownit via @wendylpc
"Ice Bath and Cookies Ahead!!" #MarathonCheeringSigns via @runnerstud
#MarathonCheeringSigns "Just when you thought you was done..." mile 26.2 at my first 50k ultra via @itzmykeyb
Sweat is sexy #MarathonCheeringSigns @RunningQuotes via @anahiboesch
"Forget www.Match.com, I'm looking for a man that can go long" #MarathonCheeringSigns
Really great people make you feel that you, too, can become great. ~Mark Twain
"There is a #magic formula...It's just that the magic is different for everyone" Keith Dowling
"Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit." - Bern Williams #quote via @SusanCosmos
